item.title: Hells-History
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:8, topic:422690”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=525352.msg3826076#msg3826076 date=1322191871]
Edit: This isn’t even a download.
[/quote]

This is the server development section

That ‘turn on/off pvp’ thing gave me an idea. I always thought if RuneScape were real, you’d be able to kill whoever the fuck you please wherever you want. So maybe this feature could apply to the entire world (of this particular server). You must set it on or off and it is set to off when you log in. You can attack people with it on anywhere but can’t attack people with it off. Maybe an exception to when they’re banking or trading… I don’t know that’s just a thought I had. Maybe you should make it work

Good luck with this.[/quote]
Read this modified version, saying the exact same thing:[quote=“eyeownyew, post:6, topic:422690”]How can you give yourself credits, if you don’t even know what the end will turn out to be. [This isn’t even a download. (Why give creds?)] So many things wrong.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Hells-History
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:8, topic:422690”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=525352.msg3826076#msg3826076 date=1322191871]
Edit: This isn’t even a download.
[/quote]

This is the server development section

That ‘turn on/off pvp’ thing gave me an idea. I always thought if RuneScape were real, you’d be able to kill whoever the fuck you please wherever you want. So maybe this feature could apply to the entire world (of this particular server). You must set it on or off and it is set to off when you log in. You can attack people with it on anywhere but can’t attack people with it off. Maybe an exception to when they’re banking or trading… I don’t know that’s just a thought I had. Maybe you should make it work

Good luck with this.[/quote]
sounds like a nice idea (y)

Read full topic

item.title: Hells-History
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

eyeownyew:

Edit: This isn’t even a download.

This is the server development section

That ‘turn on/off pvp’ thing gave me an idea. I always thought if RuneScape were real, you’d be able to kill whoever the fuck you please wherever you want. So maybe this feature could apply to the entire world (of this particular server). You must set it on or off and it is set to off when you log in. You can attack people with it on anywhere but can’t attack people with it off. Maybe an exception to when they’re banking or trading… I don’t know that’s just a thought I had. Maybe you should make it work

Good luck with this.

Read full topic
